community-is-approved: This community requires approval for joining.
if-community-is-approved: After applying for membership and getting approved, you can view the content.
after-join: After applying for membership and getting approved, you can

empty.withdraw-1: Joining the community automatically adds you to the group chat.
empty.withdraw-3: Note: Leaving the community also automatically exits you from the chat.

dialog.confirm: Are you sure you want to leave the community?
dialog.note: Leaving the community also exits you from the group chat.
dialog.confirm-delete-title: Are you sure you want to delete the post?
dialog.note-delete-title1: Blocking results in forced removal from this community. You won't be able to view or rejoin this community. If you want to report to the administration, please do so from the profile or personal message screen of the relevant member.
dialog.note-delete-title2: Deleting will make the post content and associated comments inaccessible.

comment.delete-community: Are you sure you want to delete the comment?

form.name: Community Name

placeholder.name: Please enter within 40 characters
placeholder.administrator: Select members you want to add as administrators
placeholder.tag: Setting community tags makes it easier to search
placeholder.tag-SP: Makes it easier to search when set

form.explain: Administrators can perform all management tasks except deleting the community.

dialog.title: Delete Community
dialog.content: Once deleted, it cannot be recovered. Are you sure you want to delete?

dialog-block.title: Block this member?
dialog-block.content: Blocking this member will result in forced removal from the community. They won't be able to view or rejoin this community. If you want to report to the administration, please do so from the profile or personal message screen of the relevant member.
dialog-block.content1: Blocking this member will result in forced removal from the community. They won't be able to view or rejoin this community.
dialog-block.content2: If you want to report to the administration, please do so from the profile or personal message screen of the relevant member.

dialog-unblock.title: Unblock this member?
dialog-unblock.content: Unblocking allows the member to join this community and view its content.
